content: With the Flame Orb equipped your Burn resistance is moderately increased, which is especially useful in the Flaming Mountains.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Flame_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Flame Orb'.
The content is as follows:
With the Flame Orb equipped your Burn resistance is moderately increased, which is especially useful in the Flaming Mountains.
